definition: Russian ethnic group (of northeast China and Xinjiang etc)/Russian nationality/Russians (of Russia)
Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Most believers amongst the Russian minority are Eastern Orthodox.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯族中大部分人信仰東正教。

sentences.english: Russian nationality is an important member in Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯族是中華民族大家庭的重要成員之一。
